statements.delete: DELETE FROM PSP_BigUser_Values where ItemID=#ItemID# and TypeID=#TypeID# and Flag2=#Flag2#

DELETE FROM PSP_BigUser_Values where ItemID=#ItemID# and TypeID=#TypeID#
DELETE FROM PSP_BigUser_Types WHERE ID = #TypeID# and ItemID=#ItemID#
DELETE FROM PSP_BigUser_Values where ItemID=#ItemID# and TypeID=#TypeID# and Flag2=#Flag2#
statements.update: If Exists(Select ID from PSP_BigUser_Values Where Year=#Year# And TypeID=#TypeID# and ItemID=#ItemID# and Flag2=#Flag2# ) UPDATE PSP_BigUser_Values SET "Value" = #Value# WHERE "TypeID" = #TypeID# And "Year" = #Year# And "ItemID" = #ItemID# And "Flag2" = #Flag2# Else INSERT INTO PSP_BigUser_Values ( "TypeID", "Year", "Value", "ItemID", "Flag2" ) VALUES ( #TypeID#, #Year#, #Value#, #ItemID#, #Flag2# )

DELETE FROM PSP_BigUser_Values WHERE Year = #Year# And TypeID in (Select ID from PSP_BigUser_Types where ItemID=#ItemID#) and ItemID=#ItemID# and Flag2=#Flag2# DELETE FROM PSP_BigUser_Years WHERE Year = #Year# and ItemID = #ItemID# and Flag=#Flag2#
statements.select: SELECT "ID", "TypeID", "Year", "Value", "Flag2", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5", "ItemID" FROM PSP_BigUser_Values where ItemID=#ItemID# and Flag2=#Flag2# and TypeID in (Select ID from PSP_BigUser_Types where ItemID=#ItemID#) order by TypeID,convert(int,Year)
